# extensions
* markdown
  * audio playlist
  * software list
  * test io
* generated files
  * music directory lists

# deployment
* publish sph-info/content to /srv/http/sph-info/static
* link sph-info/dynamic/root to /srv/http/sph-info/dynamic/
* link sph-info/dynamic/temp to /srv/http/sph-info/temp
